For the fourth article reflection, we'll take a look at the article [Predicting Exercise Behavior in Fitness Applications](http://repository.ittelkom-pwt.ac.id/3318/1/Predicting%20Exercise%20Behavior%20in%20Fitness%20Applications-%20A%20Multi-Gro.pdf).

For the reflection,

* Outline the main points in the article.

* How was cluster analysis used in this study?

* What was being predicted, and what role did the cluster analysis play in that prediction?

* Critique the tables and graphics used in this article.

Your write-up should be typed, single-spaced, and less than 4 pages in length.
